page.title: 15HOSPITALS IN BRENTWOOD
page.content: {Highwood}covers 28 acres of land. It was founded in 1898 as an asylum and in 1918/19 it was for sane epileptics. Then for 19 years it was used to treat children suffering from tuberculosis. Now it is a geriatric hospital with an orthopaedic ward. There are 220 patients with a female majority. {St.Faith's}is a hospital for people with epilepsy founded in 1854 and first used for epileptics in 1915. There are 93 patients, mainly elderly, and 200 staff. {Warley}is a big hospital with 750 patients and 36 wards.It treats mainly old people with mental illness.The maj -ority of patients are female. There are over 1000 staff including 20 full- time doctors. There is a large nurses home and accommodation for staff and their families. Most patients are treated at home by community nurses.
